mapper.select: SELECT VT_NO,VT_NAME, VT_O_NO,O_ONAME, VT_R_START_DATE, VT_R_END_DATE,VT_R_YN, VT_A_START_DATE,VT_A_END_DATE, VT_CLASS, VT_DCLASS, VT_TOT, VT_SUBJECT, VT_SUBJECT,VT_DESC, SUB_NAME,CLASS_NAME,DCLASS_NAME FROM VT_RECRUIT A, DCLASS B, CLASS C, SUBJECT D, ORGAN E WHERE A.VT_CLASS = C.CLASS_NO AND A.VT_DCLASS = B.DCLASS_NO AND B.CLASS_NO = C.CLASS_NO AND A.VT_SUBJECT = D.SUB_NO AND A.VT_O_NO = E.O_NO AND VT_NO = #{vt_no}
mapper.update: UPDATE VT_RECRUIT SET VT_NAME = #{vt_name}, VT_R_END_DATE = #{vt_r_end_date}, VT_A_START_DATE = #{vt_a_start_date}, VT_A_END_DATE = #{vt_a_end_date}, VT_CLASS = #{vt_class},VT_DCLASS = #{vt_dclass}, VT_TOT = #{vt_tot}, VT_SUBJECT = #{vt_subject}, VT_DESC = #{vt_desc} WHERE VT_NO = #{vt_no}
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, a.* from (select c.* from vt_rqn b, vt_recruit c where b.vt_no = c.vt_no and b.vt_m_no = #{vt_m_no}) a) where rn between #{startrow} and #{endrow}
